sentences.sContent: Every debt he owed in the world, including the pawnshop, with its usurious interest, amounted to less than a hundred dollars.
sentences.sContent_eng: Every debt he owed in the world, including the pawnshop, with its usurious interest, amounted to less than a hundred dollars.
sentences.sCn: 他在世界上欠下的每一笔帐，包括高利贷的当铺债务，加在一起也不到一百元。

sentences.sContent: These companies, cut off from bank loans at reasonable rates of interest, had turned instead to supposedly usurious moneylenders, known as the curb market.
sentences.sContent_eng: These companies, cut off from bank loans at reasonable rates of interest, had turned instead to supposedly usurious moneylenders, known as the curb market.
sentences.sCn: 这些中小企业无法以合理的贷款利率从银行获得贷款，他们因此只好求助于所谓高利贷放贷机构。

sentences.sContent: To Mr Yunus and its other critics, the Mexican bank is no better than an old-fashioned loan shark, earning its huge profits by charging poor borrowers a usurious interest rate of at least 79% a year.
sentences.sContent_eng: To Mr Yunus and its other critics, the Mexican bank is no better than an old-fashioned loan shark, earning its huge profits by charging poor borrowers a usurious interest rate of at least 79% a year.
sentences.sCn: 在尤纳斯和其他一些批评人士看来，该行无异于旧时高利贷主，狂征暴敛，向穷人们放贷，年利率不低于79%。
